George Henry Ford aka G
H
Ford (ubochí irí abụọ n'ọnwa Mee 1808 London rụọ July 1876 na London), bụ ónyé na-ese ihe osise akụkọ ihe mere eme nke South Africa nke sonyeere British Museum na 1837
O gosipụtara ụmụ anụmanụ ma mepụta efere na Sir Andrew Smith's Illustrations of the Zoology of South Africa
Ford bụ nwa nwoke nke ónyé ọrụ ugbo England na Cape, James Edward Ford, ónyé n'onwe ya bụ ónyé na-ese obere ihe
Ónyé isi ụgbọ mmiri A mụrụ James Edward Ford, otu n'ime ndị 1820 Settlers, na England na 1770, wee kwaga South Africa, daa na Port Elizabeth n'ọnwa Eprel 1820
Ebe e kenyere ndị otu ahụ dị n'etiti Bathurst na ọnụ Osimiri Great Fish ma kpọọ ya Cuylerville mgbè Col
Jacob Cuyler Ford, nwunye ya Frances Stransham, na ụmụ ha asaa so na 256 Settlers na ụgbọ mmiri Chapman

Ụmụ ya bụ Frances Jane Ford irí na anọ, James Samuel Ford irí na àtó, George Henry Ford irí na otu, Edward Stransham Ford itoolu, Adelaide Elizabeth Ford asatọ, Jane Murray Ford isii, na John Henry Ford àtó.
Andrew Smith matara ezinụlọ Ford na 1821 mgbè ọ na-eleta ndị ọrụ ugbo, na-agba ha ume ka ha nye ya ihe ndị na-adọrọ mmasị
George Ford na-eto eto na-arịa ọrịa site na úkwù gbajiri agbaji nke ehi kpatara, mmerụ ahụ nke mere ka ọ bụrụ ónyé nwere nkwarụ kpamkpam, na-akpali Smith ịkpọrọ ya laghachi Cape Town
Mgbè ọ na-agbake n'ebe ahụ, a gbara ya ume ise ihe na ise ihe osise Smith

O gosipụtara na ọ maara nkè ọma nké na n'afọ 1825, Smith tụụrụ ya aro ka ọ gaa na South African Museum nke e guzobere ọhụrụ na Cape Town, ma mesịa nyere ya aka na 1834 "Njem màkà Ịchọpụta Central Africa"

Akụkọ banyere njem a bụ Illustrations of the zoology of South Africa, nke nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ na nkọwa nke ihe ndị sitere n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke okike anakọtara n'oge njem n'ime ime South Africa, n'afọ 1834, 1835, na 1836.
Mgbè Smith laghachiri England na 1837, Ford sonyeere ya ma n'oge na-adịghị anya chọta nkwanye ùgwù maka ịdị mma nke ọrụ ya
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na British Museum ma soro Smith rụọ ọrụ n'ebe ahụ bụ ónyé nsogbu nke Bloomsbury semi-basement mechara chụpụ
Ford gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ n'okpuru John Edward Gray, onye na-enyere ónyé na-elekọta anụmanụ aka
N'ihi ọrịa backache na-adịghị ala ala, Ford mechara rụọ ọrụ site n'ụlọ Surbiton nke Albert Günther ónyé ga-anọchi Gray na 1875.
George Viner Ellis (afọ 1812 rụọ afọ 1900) nọchiri oche nke Anatomy na Mahadum College London n'afọ 1850, wee bụrụ otu n'ime ndị ọkachamara n'ihe gbasara ahụike nke oge ya
Ụlọ ọrụ a, n'ime afọ iri atọ na ise mbụ nke ịdị adị ya, bipụtara ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke atlas anatomical
Ellis na Ford jiri usoro ọhụrụ nke chromolithography màkà atlas nke alaeze ha nke iri ise na asatọ, Illustrations of Dissections in a Series of Original Coloured Plates the Size of Life
A na-eme efere ndị ahụ n'etiti afọ 1863 na 1867, site na anọ ruo asaa a na-emecha kwa afọ
A na-ewere efere ndị a dị ka ihe doro anya na nke ziri ezi, na ihe ngosi mara mma nke ozu, nke Mintern Bros., bipụtara, nke James Walton bipụtara.
Ford lụrụ Emma Ethel Ford
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ asatọ.
A na-echeta Ford na áhà sayensị nkè ụdị agwọ Hispaniolan, Chilabothrus fordii (Ford's boa).
